item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "People are stupid. They will believe a lie because they want to believe it's true, or because they are afraid it might be true." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "I'm afraid that we all make mistakes. One of the things that defines our character is how we handle mistakes. If we lie about having made a mistake, then it can't be corrected and it festers. On the other hand, if we give up just because we made a mistake, even a big mistake, none of us would get far in life." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "I am who I am; no more, no less." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "Love is not about what you want. It's about finding happiness for the one you love." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "Nothing marks a man's character better than his attraction to intelligence." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "The Second Rule is that the greatest harm can result from the best intentions. It sounds a paradox, but kindness and good intentions can be an insidious path to destruction. Sometimes doing what seems right is wrong, and can cause harm. The only counter to it is knowledge, wisdom, forethought, and understanding the First Rule. Even then, that is not always enough." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Micah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "Wrong doing must be punished. If not, it will proliferate until anarchy wears the robes of tolerance and understanding." -- Terry Goodkind
